snippet.title: Zero Losses - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the unsettling trailer for Zero Losses, an upcoming first-person drive through the horrors of modern warfare. In Zero Losses, survive the modern warfare horror as a soldier of a support battalion, driving your truck through the war-ravaged lands behind the frontline. While others carry the banner of victory forward, your task is not to shoot, but to ensure that this "special operation" has zero losses. Zero Losses will be available on PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
